effect.minecraft.absorption.description: §fAdds damage some damaging absorbing hearths (which can't be regenerated); higher levels give more absorption.
effect.minecraft.bad_omen.description: §fCauses an illager raid to start upon entering a village; higher levels increase the raid difficulty.
effect.minecraft.blindness.description: §fImpairs vision and disables the ability to sprint and critical hit.
effect.minecraft.conduit_power.descripti: §fIncreases underwater visibility and mining speed, prevents drowning.
effect.minecraft.dolphins_grace.descript: §fDrastically increases swimming speed. Effect given by dolphins
effect.minecraft.fire_resistance.descrip: §fGrants immunity to fire damage as well as damage from lava.
effect.minecraft.glowing.description: §fMarks affected entities with an outline glow, allowing them to be seen through blocks.
effect.minecraft.haste.description: §fIncreases mining and attack speed; higher levels increase both stats further.
effect.minecraft.health_boost.descriptio: §fIncreases maximum health; higher levels give more additional hearths.
effect.minecraft.hero_of_the_village.des: §fGives discounts on trades with villagers, and makes villagers throw items at the player depending on their profession.
effect.minecraft.hunger.description: §fIncreases food exhaustion; higher levels cause to starve quicker.
effect.minecraft.instant_damage.descript: §fDamages living entities, heals undead; higher levels increase the effect potency.
effect.minecraft.instant_health.descript: §fHeals living entities, damages undead; higher levels increase the effect potency.
effect.minecraft.invisibility.descriptio: §fGrants invisibility, making the user invisible and reducing its detection range. Held or worn items will still be visible. Higher levels further decrease the detection range
effect.minecraft.jump_boost.description: §fIncreases jump height and reduces fall damage; higher levels increase both effects.
effect.minecraft.luck.description: §fCan increase chances of high-quality and more loot; higher levels increase the chances of better loot.
effect.minecraft.mining_fatigue.descript: §fDecreases mining and attack speed; higher levels decrease both stats further.
effect.minecraft.night_vision.descriptio: §fImproves vision in dark areas and underwater.
effect.minecraft.poison.description: §fInflicts non lethal damage over time; higher levels do more damage per second. Does not affect undeads.
effect.minecraft.regeneration.descriptio: §fRegenerates health over time; higher levels make health regenerate quicker.
effect.minecraft.slow_falling.descriptio: §fDecreases falling speed and negates fall damage.
effect.minecraft.slowness.description: §fDecreases walking speed; higher levels make the user slower and decrease their field of view.
effect.minecraft.speed.description: §fIncreases walking speed; higher levels make the user faster and increase their field of view.
effect.minecraft.strength.description: §fIncreases melee damage; higher levels increase the damage boost power.
effect.minecraft.unluck.description: §fCan reduce chances of high-quality and more loot; higher levels reduce the chance of good loot.
effect.minecraft.water_breathing.descrip: §fPrevents drowning and allows to breathe underwater.
effect.minecraft.weakness.description: §fDecreases melee damage; higher levels decrease damage dealt further.
effect.minecraft.wither.description: §fInflicts lethal damage over time; higher levels do more damage per second.
